long_description: Packed on your back or rolled like a suitcase, the Timbuk2 Aviator Wheeled Backpack is a high-capacity, expertly organized pack with sophisticated styling that works downtown or out of town. Converts from suitcase to travel backpack with stowaway padded straps and removable hipbelt; great for going up a lot of stairs, over cobblestones or to remote train stations. Skateboard wheels and extending handle provide a silent, gliding roll. Large top compartment holds boots or a bulky jacket and can extend down into the main compartment if needed. Main duffel-style compartment has a U-shape zipper for easy packing. 3 external zippered pockets hold a phone, wallet, book or other quick-access items; the one on the side stows the backpack hipbelt when it's not needed. Made from durable nylon and reinforced tarpaulin fabric. External compression straps; grab handles on all sides. Padded, ventilated back panel on the Timbuk2 Aviator Wheeled Backpack lets you carry it in comfort in warm weather.
short_description: Packed on your back or rolled like a suitcase, the Timbuk2 Aviator Wheeled Backpack is a high-capacity, expertly organized pack with sophisticated styling that works downtown or out of town.
